processingCommand.script:
uname -a
date
echo "id_vara :${id}"
echo "ANOWVAR:PARENT.test_type=${node}"
echo "ANOWVAR:PARENT.id_vara=${id}"
echo "ANOWVAR:PARENT.test101_name=${name}"
echo "ANOWVAR:PARENT.pro_status=${processingStatus}"
echo "ANOWVAR:PARENT.exit_code=${exitCode}"
echo "ANOWVAR:PARENT.exit_status=${exitMessage}"
